snippet: The Philadelphia 76ers landed their first No. 1 overall draft pick in 20 years on Tuesday at the NBA’s Draft Lottery.    Philadelphia have endured a dreadful three-year stretch that was a part of a rebuilding plan to restock the franchise wi...
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers landed their first No. 1 overall draft pick in 20 years on Tuesday at the NBA’s Draft Lottery.    Philadelphia have endured a dreadful three-year stretch that was a part of a rebuilding plan to restock the franchise with top picks.

headline.main: Sixers Win Top Pick in Draft Lottery
headline.print_headline: Sixers Win Top Pick in Draft Lottery
